DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare kidney function patient receive transplanted kidney treat combination sirolimus , daclizumab , mycophenolate corticosteroid versus transplant patient treated cyclosporine , mycophenolate corticosteroid .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Sirolimus Kidney Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Kidney transplantation Donor must least 60 year old . Current systemic infection Unstable angina treatment serious arrhythmia . Cancer within previous 5 year .
